name: In the Morning Turns to Ash (2018)
name_original: In the Morning Turns to Ash (2018)
description:
This is a remake of my first Unity project from 2016.

In the Morning Turns to Ash is a first-person narrative game poem about a man who tries to come to grips with his father's recent death by returning to the wilderness retreat where they used to camp together.

The game takes 25-30 minutes to complete and is designed to be played in one sitting.

It's a game about fathers and sons, parents and children, regrets and love.

CONTROLS

WASD                 = move

Mouse                = look around

Escape               = menu

More from this developer: https://johnvanderhoef.itch.io
